pageTitle: Real Foods soy & linseed corn thins - Waitrose
textBeforeTable: Nutrition Source of omega 311% dietary fibreGluten freeNon GMOKosher-pareveAustralian made&ownedCrispbread slices.Golden sun-ripened corn with soy and linseedReal Foods Soy&Linseed Corn Thins are the best tasting wholegrain crispbread you can buy. Made with a unique blend of maize, soy and linseed - a great recipe for maximum crunch and flavour - they taste sensational on their own, or with any number of delicious toppings.Our Soy&Linseed Corn Thins are made simply by popping grains of maize with added soy and linseed under high temperature. With more dietary fibre per gram than wholemeal bread, a source of Omega 3, and 70% less fat than the leading brands of corn chips, Real Foods Corn Thins really are good for you.Real Foods is proud to be producing wholesome and natural products for people who enjoy great tasting real food.
